category.name: Family Prayers
category.description: Prayers for family devotion and spiritual growth

content.text:
GOD, MY CREATOR AND MY SAVIOR,
Author of all life and the Source of all good things,

I adore You for making me able to know You,
for giving me reason and a conscience,
and for leading me to even want You.
I praise You for showing us who You are in the gospel,
for Your compassionate heart,
for Your peaceful thoughts toward me,
for Your patience and kindness,
and for Your amazing mercy.

You've opened my eyes to understand how
guilty people can be pardoned,
unholy people can be made holy,
and the spiritually poor can be made rich.

Let me always be one of those people who doesn't just hear about You but actually knows You,
who walks with You and finds joy in You,
who takes You at Your word and finds real life there.

Keep me always hungry
for the salvation I can experience right nowâ€”the comfort and joy of the Holy Spirit,
for spiritual gifts and blessings,
and for help to value my responsibilities as much as my privileges.

Help me to value a simple and genuinely godly character.
Help me to be the same person in private with You that I appear to be in public.
Help my faith to be real before I ever talk about it.
Help me to leave worldly values at the door before I even enter the church,
to set my heart on things above,
to avoid foolish and empty sins,
to be someone who shares grace, not just receives it,
and to be prepared to endure hardship, not just to do good.

O God, make me worthy of this calling,
so that the name of Jesus will be glorified in me, and my life will be glorified in Him.
